description: Episode of Series "Film making techniques". Larry Boehlins, an experienced "gaffer" covers key points such as: sources of power, hook up, the use of filters on lights and cameras, polaroid filters, window diffusion, use of reflectors etc. The film introduces a variety of grip equipment.
